title: close to usc, single, pet okay, large kitchen
posting_body: We just got this apartment ...these pictures ĺof the apartment are taken Monday
Just send me your phone and I'll have somebody call you .. after you email me back from this post ...the rent is :
...meaning you DO NOT pay your own electricity and gas AND the water and the trash free too!
There's no off-street parking BUT you can usually find a space on the street.
There's a small city park or a pocket park across the street that has overnight parking ..

If you want to send me a picture of your dog if you have a small dog.. I can get it over to the office because your application has to be approved by the office ..if you want an application let me know when you email.
This apartment is on the third floor in a three story building.
Relatively close to USC, Staples Center and LA Live.
Bring your small dog ..small pets are usually allowed.
The apartment is really cute... ideal for one person in a small pet.
The apartment has a separate kitchen and bathroom with closet, stove, refrigerator are included at no additional charge if you need them.

There's a kitchen large enough to fit stove refrigerator along with a long kitchen counter with sink and window ...a large living room with 8 foot window and then the bathroom is remodeled with a window bathtub with a shower, toilet and sink.
If you want to see the apartment send me your number...I will call.
btw your application needs to be approved by the office.
The building's address is: 1823 West Pico boulevard Los Angeles California 90006
